SELECT amountRange FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN price BETWEEN 0 AND 299999 THEN '0~29만원' WHEN price BETWEEN 300000 AND 499999 THEN '30~49만원' WHEN price BETWEEN 500000 AND 799999 THEN '50~79만원' WHEN price BETWEEN 800000 AND 999999 THEN '80~99만원' WHEN price >= 1000000 THEN '100만원 이상' END AS amountRange, CASE WHEN price BETWEEN 0 AND 299999 THEN 1 WHEN price BETWEEN 300000 AND 499999 THEN 2 WHEN price BETWEEN 500000 AND 799999 THEN 3 WHEN price BETWEEN 800000 AND 999999 THEN 4 WHEN price >= 1000000 THEN 5 END AS order_key FROM tt_funding f WHERE f.member_id = (SELECT member_id FROM tt_member WHERE is_manager = 1) AND f.start_date >= TO_DATE(#{departure}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND f.end_date <= TO_DATE(#{arrival}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) subquery ORDER BY subquery.order_key

SELECT DISTINCT t.title FROM tt_theme t JOIN tt_funding_theme ft ON t.theme_id = ft.theme_id JOIN tt_funding f ON ft.funding_id = f.funding_id JOIN tt_member m ON f.member_id = m.member_id WHERE m.is_manager = 1 AND f.start_date >= TO_DATE(#{departure}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND f.end_date <= TO_DATE(#{arrival}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND f.funding_state != 3

SELECT result.funding_id FROM ( SELECT f.funding_id FROM tt_funding f JOIN tt_funding_theme ft ON f.funding_id = ft.funding_id JOIN tt_theme t ON ft.theme_id = t.theme_id JOIN tt_member m ON m.member_id = f.member_id WHERE f.start_date >= TO_DATE(#{departure}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND f.end_date <= TO_DATE(#{arrival}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND f.price BETWEEN #{priceLow} AND #{priceHigh} AND f.funding_state != 3
AND t.title IN
#{theme}
AND m.is_manager = 1 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE() ) result WHERE ROWNUM = 1
